本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: To learn how to write academic essays using proper referencing and citation and present the ideas using visual aids.
授業方法: For AY 2022/2023 the plan is to teach face-to-face in the classroom with precautions to prevent the spread of covid. However, if the covid situation worsens there is a possibility that classes may be moved to partially or wholly online. The teacher will update you at that time in detail if that happens but in general classes would use Zoom, Luna, and other online tools.

All course meetings are planned to be face-to-face.
